definition: Mt Tai 泰山[Tai4 Shan1] in Shandong/abbr. for Thailand
Tamil Nadu, southeast Indian state, capital Chennai 欽奈|钦奈[Qin1 nai4]/formerly Madras state 馬德拉斯邦|马德拉斯邦[Ma3 de2 la1 si1 bang1]
pinyin: Tai4 mi3 er3 Na4 de2 bang1

definition: Tamil Nadu, southeast Indian state, capital Chennai 欽奈|钦奈[Qin1 nai4]/formerly Madras state 馬德拉斯邦|马德拉斯邦[Ma3 de2 la1 si1 bang1]

pinyin: Tai4 mi3 er3 Yi1 la1 mu3 Meng3 hu3 Jie3 fang4 Zu3 zhi1
containing_words.word: 泰米爾伊拉姆猛虎解放組織

pinyin: Tai4 mi3 er3 Meng3 hu3 Zu3 zhi1

sentences.english: Occasionally, such invasions resulted in Tamil rule for extended periods.
sentences.chinese: 有時，這樣的入侵導致泰米爾人統治期的延長。

sentences.english: The youngster could recite all 1330 couplets of Tamil epic at the age of 3.
sentences.chinese: 拉維納什利3歲就能背誦1330條泰米爾經典聖言。

sentences.english: India's anti-LTTE policy blinds their vision.
sentences.chinese: 印度的反泰米爾政策矇蔽自己的視野。

sentences.english: He was assassinated in 1989 by a female Tamil terrorist.
sentences.chinese: 1989年，拉吉夫被一名泰米爾女性恐怖分子暗殺。

sentences.english: But it might offer the chance to win Tamil loyalties.
sentences.chinese: 但這也爲贏得泰米爾人的忠心提供了機會。

sentences.english: The official languages are English, Mandarin, Malay and Tamil.
sentences.chinese: 官方語言是英語，華話，馬來語和泰米爾語。

sentences.english: Tamil Nadu has a unique place in the world of Indian science.
sentences.chinese: 泰米爾納德邦在印度科學界的地位無可替代。

sentences.english: Several Sinhala kings are noted for driving back the Tamil invasions.
sentences.chinese: 若干位僧伽羅國王因擊退泰米爾人入侵而留名。

sentences.english: Pongal is a harvest festival celebrated by Tamils across the world. (AP Photo/Rafiq Maqbool)
sentences.chinese: 馴牛節是全世界泰米爾人歡慶豐收的節日。

sentences.english: They, in turn, were ruthless in killing and marginalising more moderate Tamils.
sentences.chinese: 他們無情的殺戮轉而使更多的溫和派泰米爾人邊緣化。

sentences.english: There is also a handicrafts exhibition cum fair organized by the Government of Tamil Nadu.
sentences.chinese: 還有一個手工藝品展暨公平的泰米爾納德邦政府主辦。
